name: Dark Power
description: I am banished to this prison, but all is not lost. I can expend my energy to conjure items or learn new powers, but it can take a toll on my life force. In order to sustain this power, I will have to take a darker path...

quests.name: Essence Drain
quests.description: The creatures with bows hold knowledge of this dark place. Perhaps if I slay a few I can collect their power for my own.

quests.name: Seeds
quests.description: The creation of life is not an easy task, but I have no choice.

quests.name: Essence Drain
quests.description: The green monsters are stealthy, but inefficient in their methods.

quests.name: Essence Drain
quests.description: The spiders wait and lurk in the shadows waiting for easy targets. They contain the knowledge of adaptation.

quests.name: Essence Drain
quests.description: The blaze represent the hatred of this place.

quests.name: Essence Drain
quests.description: Zombies contain the knowledge of primal survival.

quests.name: Soul Bound
quests.description: I can gain dark power by slaying the mobs around me. The player focus will determine the creation of the object or spell I am to create before it drains my power. NOTE: THE REPUTATION TASKS REQUIRE THE BOOK TO BE CLOSED AND REOPENED TO REGISTER.

tasks.longDescription: Power is gained in the form of reputation. Slaying quests will give reputation while completing other tasks here will deplete it.

quests.name: Magnetism
quests.description: I have discovered a way to draw mobs closer to me. While this may not seem useful against creepers or zombies, ranged monsters will no longer be able to cower away.

quests.name: Wind Wall
quests.description: The particles in the air lend me their help as I cast away any projectiles that find their way in my direction.

quests.name: Fortune Dig
quests.description: My current methods of resource extraction are rather reckless. By becoming more precise, I can harvest more from a single block.

quests.name: AOE Dig
quests.description: As I have dug around this world of endless caves, it seems that not all walls are structurally sound. It may be possible to destroy more than one block at once.

quests.name: Dig 1
quests.description: Pickaxes are bulky and need to be maintained. I have learned that by directing mana at the weak spots in the rock, I can force it to break at my will.

quests.name: Mining Beam
quests.description: Bah! If I wish to find anything in this prison, I must be able to dig faster...

quests.name: Magelight
quests.description: Torches lend a brilliant idea. By bending the light that is given off, I can create a new source of light at the expense of my mana pool.

quests.name: Sugar Cane
quests.description: By modifying the seeds, I can create a new plant that can be used for a different purpose.

quests.name: Wood
quests.description: In a world of stone and dirt, it isn't a surprise that there is a lack of growth. However, I can expend energy to create a single log. While inefficient, it is my only option until I can find a way to grow my own.

quests.name: Soul Boundless
quests.description: CLAIMING A SECOND FOCUS WILL CAUSE YOU TO LOSE 25 REPUTATION. DO NOT CLAIM UNLESS YOU LOSE THE FIRST.

quests.name: Shield
quests.description: By expending a minor amount of mana, I can ignore small hits and bruises.

quests.name: Adrenaline
quests.description: I can now accelerate my body to break blocks faster than before.

quests.name: Healing Aura
quests.description: I can now create a field that will provide constant healing.

quests.name: Rock Blast 1
quests.description: The skeletons of the dark lend me knowledge. By using the stones around me, I can manipulate them towards a target at a rapid speed causing damage.

quests.name: Snare
quests.description: The trickery of the spiders is ingenius! By combining the powers of the spiders and the skeletons, I can launch a projectile that will freeze my target in place!

quests.name: Magic Beam
quests.description: I can now manipulate my mana into a direct beam of destruction, causing damage to all mobs in its path.

quests.name: Fire Vortex Rune
quests.description: The stealth and potential power of the creeper has lent its knowledge to a spell of trickery. I can place a rune down that will instantaneously throw a mob through the ground, never to be seen again.

quests.name: Growth 2
quests.description: While I can grow a single plant at a time, I have discovered a way to make all plants nearby accelerate their growth. Not only that, but I can cause grass blocks to sprout with life. The only problem I forsee is that in order to create flowers or grass I must be one block below the block I am hitting.

quests.name: Fury
quests.description: Everyone has a monster inside of them.

quests.name: Mystery Spell
quests.description: My discoveries have lead to something...rather strange.

quests.name: Mark/Recall
quests.description: By noting my current locations with the spell Mark, I can then exert a massive amount of energy to return to that location.

quests.name: Rewind
quests.description: I have reached the ultimate form of power, manipulation of time. While I can't revert time to before the disaster, I can cause a disruption long enough to send me back to the location of which the spell was cast when my time is up.

quests.name: Sapling
quests.description: By combining the logs and the seeds, I can form a plant that mimics the trees of the overworld. The challenge, however, will be finding enough space to grow it.

quests.name: Essence Drain
quests.description: Beings of pure energy, they might be the key to escaping.

quests.name: String
quests.description: By fusing the fibers in the air I can create string!

quests.name: Manticore
quests.description: A flying predator with a bite that causes hunger and an overwhelming weakness.

quests.name: Chupacabra
quests.description: A common beast that shouldn't be underestimated.

quests.name: Shade
quests.description: A creature of shadow with a fearful gaze.

quests.name: Remobra
quests.description: Flying beasts with an attack of poison.

quests.name: Lobber
quests.description: A beast of molten rock and fire, he is a worthy battle.

quests.name: Afrit
quests.description: A beast of fire and destruction, yet appearingly loyal. It may be able to be tamed to my needs.

quests.name: Grue
quests.description: A beast of darkness and confusion.

quests.name: Challenge Awaits
quests.description: From great expenditure of power brings a daring challenge and reward. A tool that can summon a fantastic dungeon near me! I should be well prepared. Throwing the item will cause it to expire and summon the dungeon above or below me. It will over-write any blocks near, so I should be far from anything important.

quests.name: Cinder
quests.description: Beasts of pure fire with a burning bite.

quests.name: HQM Progress Boost
quests.description: This is a creative item only intended for servers in case of an HQM reset. Each item grants 5 reputation.

quests.name: Egg
quests.description: I can form the base of life, though rather costly.

quests.name: Snow
quests.description: Frigid use.

quests.name: Spell Book
quests.description: As I create more spells I will need a central place to hold them for easy access. By draining my power, I am also able to bind it to me.

quests.name: Geonach
quests.description: A beast that hides in the ores.

quests.name: Phantom
quests.description: A spirit that can pass through the walls.

quests.name: Clinks
quests.description: Beasts of knives and blades with sharp attacks.

quests.name: Mage Light 2
quests.description: A quick adjustment to the mage light and I have created a spell that can launch the light to latch onto the walls and roof of this cave.

quests.name: Quarry
quests.description: By influencing my spell with gravity, I have created a dig spell that acts as a small quarry that can dig out a 3x3 cube below me.

quests.name: Soulbound
quests.description: By expending my power I can create a book that has the ability to bind items to my very soul, sticking with me through death.

quests.name: Obsidian
quests.description: The monsters around me have a strange affinity to block breaking. A bit of dark power should allow me to cover my base for a bit of protection.

quests.name: Condensing Skulls
quests.description: While wither skeletons do roam this place, their frequency is rather low and often do not drop what I desire. Requires 75 dark power.

quests.name: Moonstone Duplication
quests.description: If I am able to obtain a single moonstone, I may be able to duplicate it with a little bit of dark power.

quests.name: Etherium Duplication
quests.description: I may be able to duplicate liquid etherium if I am able to obtain a sample of it.

quests.name: Sunstone
quests.description: I can now duplicate sunstone, if I have one available.

quests.name: Why Are You On Hardcore?
quests.description: This is only needed for players on Hardcore mode.
